name: SecurityScorecard
natural_language_description: 这是 SecurityScorecard 节点。主要用于: Consume SecurityScorecard API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: company | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll | (必填项)
available_options: Download (值: download) - Download a generated report
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get list of recently generated report

scorecardIdentifier.name: scorecardIdentifier
scorecardIdentifier.description: Primary identifier of a company or scorecard, i.e. domain.
scorecardIdentifier.natural_language_description: 参数名: Scorecard Identifier | 作用: Primary identifier of a company or scorecard, i.e. domain. | (必填项)

score.name: score
score.natural_language_description: 参数名: Score | 作用: Score target | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: grade (值: None) - Company score grade filter

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}

industry.name: industry
industry.natural_language_description: 参数名: Industry | 默认值: food | (必填项)

firstName.name: firstName
firstName.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Name | (必填项)

lastName.name: lastName
lastName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Last Name | (必填项)

message.name: message
message.natural_language_description: 参数名: Message | 作用: Message for the invitee | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: days_to_resolve_issue (值: None) - Minimum days to resolve a scorecard issue
grade_to_maintain (值: None) - Request the invitee's organisation to maintain a minimum grade
is_organization_point_of_contact (值: None) - Is the invitee organisation's point of contact
sendme_copy (值: None) - Whether to send a copy of the invite to the requesting user
target_url (值: None) - Optional URL to take the invitee to when arriving to the platform

portfolioId.name: portfolioId
portfolioId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Portfolio ID | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Portfolio Name | 作用: Name of the portfolio | (必填项)

privacy.name: privacy
privacy.natural_language_description: 参数名: Privacy | 默认值: shared
available_options: Private (值: private) - Only visible to you
Shared (值: shared) - Visible to everyone in your company
Team (值: team) - Visible to the people on your team

domain.name: domain
domain.natural_language_description: 参数名: Domain | 作用: Company's domain name | (必填项)

report.name: report
report.natural_language_description: 参数名: Report | 默认值: detailed | (必填项)

branding.name: branding
branding.natural_language_description: 参数名: Branding | 默认值: securityscorecard

url.name: url
url.natural_language_description: 参数名: Report URL | 作用: URL to a generated report | (必填项)

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Put Output File in Field | 提示: The name of the output binary field to put the file in | 默认值: data | (必填项)
